name: Emerji 2048
description:
Emerji is a grid style puzzle game with varying degrees of different mechanics and twists that make it one of the most addictive and challenging puzzle games to date.

• ZERO adverts while you play.
• We are not interested in any of your information.
• There are NO micro transactions.
• No messing about, just jump right in and enjoy.
• The game was made purely for the love of making games and spreading the joy we all had when video games inspired various aspects of our lives.
